name: HeartofTexasWeather
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Make weather personal! Don't trust what your weather app says. Get the most accurate forecast from someone who lives and works in Central Texas. Meteorologist Conley Isom is a Certified Broadcast Meteorologist and loves to share his passion for weather. You will get a daily weather forecast in your Flash Briefing, along with interesting weather facts.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
